dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Hmm, Natsuki and Yuri both stopped by already, so I wonder-"

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: Monika’s words were quickly cut off by the sound of the music room door swinging wide open.

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: Quickly running in was the Literature Club’s last major member, with a pep in her step.

dialogue.name: playcutscene
dialogue.string: showdad

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Ahaha, just as I thought! I’m happy you came to visit me too, Sayori."

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Ah, were Natsuki and Yuri here already??? Did I miss them??? Aww noooo, I had exciting news to share!"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Both of them did show up earlier to talk one on one with me."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Though what's got you in super high spirits right now? Your smile is the biggest I’ve ever seen!"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Ehehe, I can’t help it! Everything we’ve been doing recently has been amazing!"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "The festival went perfectly, and now we have seven amazing club members all making each other happy and positive!"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "It's everything I could ever want: Everyone being happy and supporting each other."

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: Sayori’s excited demeanor cools down, becoming more solemn but still with a genuine smile on her face.

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Seeing how much good we’ve been doing… It helps give me a reason to get out of bed every morning, knowing that we were able to accomplish this."

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "It’s still hard for me to always keep those happy thoughts in mind, but it's getting better, bit by bit each day."

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "It makes me more grateful each day that we were able to start this club."

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: All the positive news and happiness from her friends had filled Monika with an overwhelming state of emotion.

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: Tears welled up in Monika’s eyes while she listened to Sayori’s words.

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: In a burst of melancholic happiness, Monika walks over and hugs Sayori.

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: I’m… I’m so proud of you, Sayori. It means so much that you’re here with us to make this club the place it is.

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: It’s helped so many people… especially me. Thank you…

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: Ehehe… thank you too, Monika.

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: After a few moments pass, the girls break off their hug. Monika wipes her tears and takes a deep breath.

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: Aha- this is going to be a big shift in tone, but when the others came by earlier, they each sang a song with me.

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: It would make me so happy to be able to do the same with you too.

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: You don’t need to tell me twice! Let’s sing!
